name: The Jungle Is Scary
description:
Description

You play as Sapo and with the  help of his mysterious snake companion, Boros.  As you progress through the jungle you must overcome various obstacles and enemies in order to reach an ancient ruin that reside deep within the jungle to acquire a very powerful magical gem.

Credits

Artists:

  • Somsai Phachansitthi
  • Chase Vinny
  • Cassidy Hendrix

Programmers:

  • Nicholas Arnaud
  • Reginald Reed
